import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-students-list', templateUrl: './students-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./students-list.component.css'] }) export class StudentsListComponent { isLoaded = false; search(){ console.log("Kliknelo przycisk Search"); this.isLoaded = !this.isLoaded; } }
